lead_paragraph: WILD CAT AND RUNWAY NEGROES.--The following is from The Houston (Texas) Telegraph of a last date: "Mr. W. Secrest, who has recently visited the Mexican towns in the vicinity of Eagle Pass, says that he was informed that no less than two hundred and seventy runaway negroes crossed the ferries at Eagle Pass and Laredo last year.
